contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Upon consideration of the record, briefs, and argument of counsel, it is hereby ORDERED that A. Benjamin Johnson, Jr., be and he is SUSPENDED for a period of two years retroactive to and to run concurrently with the present three month and twenty-one month suspensions. Respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
